name: Zuhayr Jalal Prototypes
description:
Prototype 1 is a star field created with Processing. The cursor controls the speed of the stars, far left and they become as slow as we see from earth. Far right and they become extremely fast. It can be used to create a warp speed effect. 

Prototype 2 is an endless runner. The theme is space and the player has gravity involved.

Prototype 3 is a racing game that has AI racing with you. It's a practice track and will be developed in the future.

Prototype 4 is a painting simulator. This works only with a touch screen PC. Mobile and Leap are yet to be included.
